resources.string: How does this application work? /nIdeally, you would start out at our homepage (the one that says “Welcome to UnoWithFriends!”) and would start a new game by pressing the button that says “New Game”. Then, our application should take you to a new screen where you are asked how many total players you would like to have in your game, which can be up to 4 players. /nIf you choose to exit a game before someone is determined as the winner,
